results.title: Metformin prevents embryonic resorption induced by hyperandrogenisation with dehydroepiandrosterone in mice.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ prevents @<m>DISEASE_Embryo_Loss</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020964 @@@embryonic resorption@@@ induced by hyperandrogenisation with @CHEMICAL_Dehydroepiandrosterone @CHEMICAL_MESH:D003687 @@@dehydroepiandrosterone@@@ in @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@.

citations.NLM: Solano ME, Elia E, Luchetti CG, Sander V, Di Girolamo G, Gonzalez C, Motta AB. Metformin prevents embryonic resorption induced by hyperandrogenisation with dehydroepiandrosterone in mice. Reprod Fertil Dev. 2006;18(5):533-44. PMID: 16836960

results.title: Dehydroepiandrosterone and metformin modulate progesterone-induced blocking factor (PIBF), cyclooxygenase 2 (COX2) and cytokines in early pregnant mice.
results.text_hl: The present study examined the mechanism by which @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ (@<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@N,N'-dimethylbiguanide@@@) prevents @<m>DISEASE_Embryo_Loss</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020964 @@@embryonic resorption@@@ induced in @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@ by @CHEMICAL_Dehydroepiandrosterone @CHEMICAL_MESH:D003687 @@@dehydroepiandrosterone@@@ (@CHEMICAL_Dehydroepiandrosterone @CHEMICAL_MESH:D003687 @@@DHEA@@@).

citations.NLM: Luchetti CG, Mikó E, Szekeres-Bartho J, Paz DA, Motta AB. Dehydroepiandrosterone and metformin modulate progesterone-induced blocking factor (PIBF), cyclooxygenase 2 (COX2) and cytokines in early pregnant mice. J Steroid Biochem Mol Biol. 2008 Sep;111(3-5):200-7. PMID: 18606228
